mapper.select: SELECT m_id as mId, m_name as mName, m_category as mCategory, m_unit as mUnit FROM medicine
SELECT bundle_code as bundleCode, bundle_name as bundleName FROM bundle
SELECT i_id as iId, i_name as iName, i_unit as iUnit, bundle_code as bundleCode FROM inspection
SELECT distinct patient_id as pId FROM diagnosis_has_inspection

SELECT p.patient_id as patientId, p.patient_name as patientName, p.patient_ssn1 as patientSsn1, p.patient_phone as patientPhone, r.r_id as rId FROM reception r, patient p WHERE r.r_date = #{day} AND p.patient_id = r.patient_id AND r.r_status = "접수완료" ORDER BY r.r_time DESC;
SELECT patient_id as patientId, patient_Name as patientName, patient_ssn1 as patientSsn1 FROM patient WHERE patient_id = #{pId}

SELECT i.bundle_code as bundleCode, i.i_id as iId, i.i_name as iName, i.inspector as inspector, dd.i_result as iResult FROM (SELECT di.i_id as i_id, di.i_result as i_result, di.bundle_code as bundle_code FROM (SELECT d_id FROM diagnosis WHERE d_date = #{day} ) d, diagnosis_has_inspection di WHERE d.d_id = di.d_id AND di.patient_id=#{pId} ) dd, inspection i WHERE dd.i_id = i.i_id AND dd.bundle_code = i.bundle_code ORDER BY bundleCode ASC;

SELECT m.m_id as mId, m.m_name as mName, m.m_category mCategory, m.m_unit mUnit FROM( SELECT md.m_id FROM( select d_id from diagnosis d where d.d_date = #{day} ) d, medicine_has_diagnosis md WHERE d.d_id = md.d_id AND md.p_id = #{pId} ) t, medicine m WHERE t.m_id = m.m_id
SELECT d.comment as comment FROM ( SELECT d.r_id, d.comment FROM diagnosis d WHERE d.d_date = #{day} ) d, reception r WHERE d.r_id = r.r_id AND r.patient_id = #{pId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO diagnosis (d_id, d_date, d_status, comment, i_date, total_i_status, r_id ) VALUES( #{dId}, #{dDate}, #{dStatus}, #{comment}, #{iDate}, #{totalIstatus}, #{receptionId} )
mapper.select: SELECT d_id as dId FROM diagnosis ORDER BY d_id DESC limit 1;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO diagnosis_has_inspection (i_id, d_id, i_status, i_result, patient_id, bundle_code ) VALUES( #{iId}, #{dId}, #{iStatus}, #{iResult}, #{pId}, #{bundleCode} )
